description: '''David Peter Gray''' (born 13 June 1968) is a British singer-songwriter. Having released his debut album in 1993, he received worldwide attention with ''[[White Ladder]]'' five years later, particularly for the hit single "[[Babylon (David Gray song)|Babylon]]". ''White Ladder'' was the first of three [[record chart|chart-toppers]] in six years for Gray in the UK, where it became the [[List of best-selling albums of the 2000s (decade) in the United Kingdom|fifth best-selling album of the 2000s]]. In 2019, it was ranked as the UK's [[List of best-selling albums of the 21st century in the United Kingdom|tenth best-selling album of the 21st century]]. Gray reached the US Top 20 with five successive albums, and has received four [[Brit Awards|Brit Award]] nominations, including two nominations for Best British Male.
